comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Original Agence Meurisse photo (Meurisse catalog number on lower right corner of Bain negative) on Gallica site with caption: "La foule aux abords de la Gare de l'Est " Crowd outside Gare de l'Est gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b90412828 No mention of reservists. Pub. date 1914

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: artolog:  Thank you for making another match with a Gallica image.  We will add more details when we update the image description.  Interesting to see the differences between the Agence Meurisse and Bain News Service captions.
